title: Kenya: Land Bill Bad for Investors, Surveyors Tell State
text:
Kenya: Garissa Survivors Seek Compensation for 2012 KDF Attack 
"In the absence of a scientific inquiry and the side-stepping of other statutory processes, the bill has not clearly demonstrated the rationale used in arriving at the proposed legislations," Wambua said. Multinationals, schools and universities will lose huge chunks of land if the law is approved and enacted. Kenya
